org.scribe.builder.api

Interface Api

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConstantContactApi, DefaultApi10a, DefaultApi20, DiggApi, DropBoxApi, EvernoteApi, EvernoteApi.Sandbox, FacebookApi, FlickrApi, Foursquare2Api, FoursquareApi, FreelancerApi, FreelancerApi.Sandbox, GetGlueApi, GithubApi, GoogleApi, ImgUrApi, KaixinApi, KaixinApi20, LinkedInApi, LiveApi, LoveFilmApi, MeetupApi, MisoApi, NeteaseWeibooApi, NetProspexApi, PlurkApi, PlurkApi.Mobile, Px500Api, QWeiboApi, RenrenApi, SapoApi, SimpleGeoApi, SinaWeiboApi, SinaWeiboApi20, SkyrockApi, SohuWeiboApi, TumblrApi, TwitterApi, TwitterApi.Authenticate, TwitterApi.Authorize, TwitterApi.SSL, VimeoApi, VkontakteApi, YahooApi, YammerApi

    public interface Api
    Contains all the configuration needed to instantiate a valid OAuthService
    Author:
    Pablo Fernandez

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OAuthService createService(OAuthConfig config)
      Creates an OAuthService

    • Method Detail

      • createService

        OAuthService createService(OAuthConfig config)
        Creates an OAuthService
        Parameters:
        apiKey - your application api key
        apiSecret - your application api secret
        callback - the callback url (or 'oob' for out of band OAuth)
        scope - the OAuth scope
        Returns:
        fully configured OAuthService
